data.md:MetaData: Morphometry of the bivalve Donex striatus and the snail Natica marochiensis at the beach Ajuruteua, Brasil
This collections belongs to an article in preparation with the tentative title: Preliminary observations on gastropod predation naticids in the eastern Amazon, northern Brazil.
